children.description: Chip components and any other elements
children.description_zh: 芯片组件和任何其他元素

defaultValue.description_zh: 不受控的零部件初始值

multiple.description: Determines whether it is allowed to select multiple values, false by default
multiple.description_zh: 确定是否允许选择多个值，默认为 false

onChange.type: ((value: T extends true ? string[] : string) => void)
onChange.description: Called when value changes. If multiple prop is set, called with an array of selected values. If not, called with a string value of selected chip.
onChange.description_zh: 当值更改时调用。如果设置了 multiple prop，则使用所选值的数组调用。如果不是，则使用 selected chip 的字符串值调用。
